title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11 ยง 8.0 - Introductory
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11 ยง 8.0 - Introductory

State Regulations

The following Part 8 is hereby promulgated to establish procedures to effectuate the purposes of section
1221
of the Insurance Law with respect to insider trading by officers, directors and principals of domestic stock insurers whose stocks are sold on the "over-the- counter" market. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 11
ยง
8.0

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
